Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Augusta, Austin, Lake, Waller, Concoran, and Central due to, street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Augusta, Austin, Lake, Waller, Concoran, and Central due to, street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/33rd
ShortDescription: Northbound 52 Kedzie  buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 35th, Western, 31st, and California due to, street blockage near California/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #52 Kedzie  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 35th, Western, 31st, and California due to, street blockage near California/33rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
